stats: Your Hot Streak, Missile Barrage, and Brain Freeze talents also grant you 12% haste for 5 sec when the effect of the talent is consumed
Your Mirror Image ability also causes you to deal 18% additional damage for 30 sec
You gain 25% more mana when you use a mana gem. In addition, using a mana gem grants you 225 spell power for 15 sec
Your offensive spells gain an additional 5% increased critical strike bonus damage
Reduces the casting time of your Polymorph spell by 0.15 sec

Increases the armor you gain from Ice Armor by 20%, the mana regeneration you gain from Mage Armor by 10%, and adds an additional 15% of your Spirit in critical strike rating when Molten Armor is active
Increases the critical strike chance of your Fireball, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, Arcane Missiles, and Arcane Blast spells by 5%
Your Arcane Blast, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, and Fireball spells have a chance to grant you 350 spell power for 15 sec
You have a chance for the effect of your Missile Barrage, Hot Streak, or Brain Freeze talent not to be consumed when you cast the spells which benefit

Increases the armor you gain from Ice Armor by 20%, the mana regeneration you gain from Mage Armor by 10%, and adds an additional 15% of your Spirit in critical strike rating when Molten Armor is active
Increases the critical strike chance of your Fireball, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, Arcane Missiles, and Arcane Blast spells by 5%
